text: Mass Appeal is a 1984 American comedy-drama movie directed by Glenn Jordan and was based on the 1980 play of the same name by Bill C. Davis. It stars Jack Lemmon, Å½eljko Ivanek, Charles Durning, Louise Latham, Talia Balsman and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 comedy- drama movies Category:1984 LGBT movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Glenn Jordan Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Mass Appeal
